entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
